title: Terrific tuna salad
ingredients: ['1 (200g) tin tuna, drained and flaked', '6 tablespoons mayonnaise or salad dressing', '1 tablespoon grated Parmesan cheese', '3 tablespoons sweet pickle such as Branston', '1/8 teaspoon dried onion flakes', '1/4 teaspoon curry powder', '1 tablespoon dried parsley', '1 teaspoon dried dill', '1 pinch garlic granules']
